sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"边，边缘"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: edge, border, margin, rim, verge, brim, fringe
means: edge ： 普通用词，指较窄的边沿。
border ： 侧重刚好在界线内的一部分表面上，指较宽的边缘，也可指边缘本身。
margin ： 指物体的空白边，一般较宽。
rim ： 指圆形或有曲线的物体的边缘。
verge ： 指明显地标志一个表在或一广阔空间的边界，或终端线，也指极狭窄的空间。常用作比喻。
brim ： 指深容器的内边或河、湖等水域的最高线。
fringe ： 指地毯的须边、围巾的花边、烫发的卷边或人群的边缘。

word_mean: 缘，边：器官或其他解剖结构之边界

sentence.Network_en: The group had a net profit margin of 30% last year.
sentence.Network_cn: 去年，这个集团的纯利润率为30%。

sentence.Network_en: The Sunday Times remains the brand leader by a huge margin.
sentence.Network_cn: 《星期日泰晤士报》仍以巨大的优势稳居报业龙头的地位。

sentence.Network_en: They could end up with a 50-point winning margin.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们最终可能会以50分的优势获胜。

不具有边距(margin)属性...所以此处定义无效,貌似margin继承了最后非position的div的属性了...用left，right，top，bottom等属性进行绝.

list.abs: marginal英语的解释,marginal的英语翻译,marg... ... marginal 继承用法 marginally 在边上; 边沿地 marginalism 边际主义.
边缘性（ Marginality ） 现在成为一股创造力， 一种新的文化视觉。 走向非中心 （Uncentred） 与多元化（Pluralistic） 成为世界性 …
边缘化（marginalization）是一个比较抽象的说法，就是非中心，非主流，或者说被主流(主流社会、主流人群、主流意识形态、主流 …

jx.jx_en_mean: an amount (usually small) that is allowed for in case of miscalculation or change of circumstances
jx.jx_cn_mean: 允许出错的余地；犯错误的余地

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin margo, margin- 'edge'

encyclopedia.content: 英文解释？名词？ n. [C] 1.边，边沿，边缘 We came to the margin of the wood. 我们来到树林的边缘。 2.页边空白；栏外 He made some notes in the margin. 他在页边空白处做笔记。 3.极限，限度 They were an old couple living on the margin of respectability. 他们是一对老夫妻，过着几乎是不太体面的日子。 4.锛埵奔洌ǚ焉媳Ａ舻娘級余地，余裕 We allowed a margin of twenty minutes in case the bus was late. 我们

entry.tran: (尤指选票或比分的)差额，差数
entry.def: A margin is the difference between two amounts, especially the difference in the number of votes or points between the winner and the loser in an election or other contest.

example.ex: They could end up with a 50-point winning margin...
example.tran: 他们最终可能会以50分的优势获胜。

example.ex: The Sunday Times remains the brand leader by a huge margin...
example.tran: 《星期日泰晤士报》仍以巨大的优势稳居报业龙头的地位。

entry.def: The margin of a written or printed page is the empty space at the side of the page.

example.ex: She added her comments in the margin.
example.tran: 她在页边的空白处写下了评语。

entry.def: If there is a margin for something in a situation, there is some freedom to choose what to do or decide how to do it.

example.ex: The money is collected in a straightforward way with little margin for error...
example.tran: 钱是直接筹集上来的，不太容易出错。

example.ex: These charges can carry prison terms of up to five years, though there's a wide margin of discretion...
example.tran: 尽管量刑幅度很大，但是这些指控仍面临长达5年的刑期。

entry.def: The margin of a place or area is the extreme edge of it.

example.ex: ...the low coastal plain along the western margin...
example.tran: 沿着西部边缘的地势低平的沿海平原

example.ex: These islands are on the margins of human habitation.
example.tran: 这些岛屿位于人类聚居地的边缘。

entry.tran: （社会、群体或活动中的）边缘地位，非主体地位
entry.def: To be on the margins of a society, group, or activity means to be among the least typical or least important parts of it.

example.ex: Students have played an important role in the past, but for the moment, they're on the margins.
example.tran: 学生过去曾经发挥了重要的作用，不过现在他们变得无足轻重了。

example.ex: ...signs of the party's rapid retreat to the political margins.
example.tran: 该党在政治上迅速失势的种种迹象

means.word_mean: 1. the boundary line or the area immediately inside the boundary
2. a permissible difference; allowing some freedom to move within limits
3. the amount of collateral a customer deposits with a broker when borrowing from the broker to buy securities
4. (finance) the net sales minus the cost of goods and services sold
5. the blank space that surrounds the text on a page
6. a strip near the boundary of an object;

sentences.sentence: "he jotted a note on the margin of the page"

auth_sentence.content: The report didn't give a margin of error.
auth_sentence.res_content: The report didn't give a margin of error.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The report didn't give a margin of error.

auth_sentence.content: But those results are within a margin of error.
auth_sentence.res_content: But those results are within a margin of error.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But those results are within a margin of error.

auth_sentence.content: But the racy rating leaves little margin for error.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the racy rating leaves little margin for error.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the racy rating leaves little margin for error.

Sentence.sentence: Maybe you will put question marks in the margin when you don't understand something and before an exam.
Most students write questions or short notes in the margins.
By focusing on the notes in the margins

sentences.en: He has the habit of making notes on the margin while reading.
sentences.cn: 他读书时有在页边空白处作注释的习惯。

sentences.en: The village is situated at the margin of a forest.

means.word_mean: 差数, 差额; 余地

sentences.en: We allowed a margin of 20 minutes in catching the train.
sentences.cn: 我们有20分钟的余地赶火车。

jushi.english: The village is situated at the margin of a forest.
He is on the margin of bare subsistence.
He has the habit of making notes on the margin while reading.
jushi.chinese: 他读书时有在页边空白处作注释的习惯。
